jd: From: Balram Kumar Singh, Spear Staffing LLC balram@spearstaffing.com Reply to: balram@spearstaffing.com Role: Python Developer- AWSClient: VanguardLocation: Oakland, CA (direct indexing provider that vanguard bought out) - 1600 Telegraph Ave - someone who can start at 7am EST – hybrid 3 days a week Tues, Wed, Thurs in CaliIV Process: 2 Rounds (1st Round with Brendan and his architect which will be technical + behavioral and 2nd is portfolio management manager)Contract Length: 12+ monthsTeam Size: 12 members - 4 portfolio managers - rest of the tech team is in Hungary, India, and PA Top Skills: Portfolio Management - (Stocks, Trading, Investment Concepts), Great Comms, AWS, Python Scripting, Infrastructure (AWS CLI, Lambda) Pulling data from AWS S3 - good way to get AWS S3, AWS Lambda, AWS EC2Writing Python ScriptsInfrastructureAngular, JavaScript - making a simple UI - a plus Qualifications- Investment systems knowledge (trading, securities, ect)- Ability to effectively communicate with portfolio managers, work closely with them to rapidly build solutions- Python strongly preferred - Knowledge of AWS services - Github Thanks and regardsBalram Kumar SinghSr Technical Recruiter Phone:- 240-261-2375Email:- balram@spearstaffing.com Website:- www.spearstaffing.com This message and any attachments are intended only for the use of the addressee and may contain information that is privileged and confidential.
